title.rendered: Fujairah International Airport (FJR) UAE Contact Details

content.rendered:
Fujairah International Airport (FJR), UAE Contact Address, Phone number, Email, Location Map, Website

Fujairah International Airport

Telephone: +971 9 2226222

Duty manager : + 971 504335236

 Fax: +971 9 2241414

Email:  info@fujairah-airport.com

Mailing Address

The Fujairah International Airport,
Department of Civil Aviation,
Government of Fujairah,
P. O. Box 977 – Fujairah,
United Arab Emirates.

IATA Code: FJR

ICAO Code: OMFJ

Website: http://fujairah-airport.com/

View Location of Fujairah International Airport: http://fujairah-airport.com/Location.aspx?CatId=2&Id=3

 

Fujairah is a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered The old fort in Fujairah’s historic town which is approximately 300 years old and the many small wind towers still standing in neighbouring villages as proud reminders of the town’s recent past. However, archaeological ations have shown that man’s presence in the region actually dates back to the Iron Age.

Facilities At Fujairah Airport (FJR)

  • Parking areas
  • Checking-In services
  • Luggage
  • Cafe
  • Duty-Free Shop
  • Wi-Fi
  • Relaxing Inside
  • Dining
  • Airport Lounges
  • Warehouse
  • Logistics Hub
  • Activities & Events
  • Visa Information
  • Terminal Maps

Lost and Found contact of Fujairah International Airport (FJR)

For any lost items, please follow the below link

Lost & Found: https://www.fujairah-airport.ae/en/contact-us/

Airlines Operated at Fujairah International Airport

Fujairah International Airport have been operates and serviced the following Airlines: Aeroflot, Air Arabia, Cathay Pacific, Egypt Air, Emirates Airlines, Enter Air, Fly Dubai, Gulf Air, Himalayan Airways, Indian Airlines, Kuwait Airlines, Oman Air, Pakistan Airlines, Royal Jordanian, Spice Jet, ZAS Airlines and others.

Car Rental contact phone number, Email – Fujairah International Airport (FJR)

Hertz, Fast Rent A CarDollar Rental CarBudget
Hertz, Fast Rent a Car
 Diamond Lease:
For any Bookings please contact: Rentalcars.com
 Budget Location: Fujairah Trade Centre Office is located in ground floor, near to the main entrance.
Email: fujairah@budget-uae.com
Phone: 0097 1 9 2235815
Fax: 00971 9 223 599 8

RTA Bus Schedule / Taxi Service Fujairah/Dubai

Bus ScheduleLost and Found Services
If you need any public transport starting from nol, Marine, Taxi,Bus,Tram and the metro, please follow the below link

http://wojhati.rta.ae/dub/XSLT_TRIP_REQUEST2?language=en

Fujairah Transportation Corp Address: Fujairah Zip Code: 3999 City of Fujairah Phone number: +971 9 2244411, +971 9 2244220

Luggage Services at Fujairah International Airport (FJR)

Fujairah International Airport services multiple airlines, each airline has different restrictions on the size and weight of your luggage. For special restrictions, here are some of the current International Flight Rules, Please contact the airlines below:

  • European Union
  • United States
  • China
  • Korea
  • Philippines
  • India
